column4: I have a file that is in use and locked. what is the command to check the app using the file?
what is the file?
my usual apt problem again ... /var/cache/debconf/config.dat :(
maybe
i had this problem and couldn't work it out :(  i will try killing that one
try dpkg-reconfigure debconf, after a reboot...

hmmm. what is the exact error message?
debconf: DbDriver "config": /var/cache/debconf/config.dat is locked by another process
does lsof give you anything?
yes ... frontend 6944 root    4rW  REG    8,1 65404 4423896 /var/cache/debconf/config.dat
the frontend app cannot seem to be killed
if you reinit to level 1, can you rename the .dat file??
hhmm not sure exactly what you mean. hmm might work on this tomorrow! chat later
